desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.thai: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.ko: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_tw: 老師聽說阿拜多斯高中欠下的債務超過9億日圓，僅靠學生 的力量光是償還利息就喘不過氣。老師雖想幫忙學生，但是茜香卻生氣地表示自己信不過大人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.thai: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.ko: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.zh_tw: 回到學校後，眾人向老師道謝，卻不小心說出了還債一事。茜香表示對老師不太信任，因而不太願意討論這個話題，選擇離開，野乃美跟隨前往。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。芹香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野宫跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野乃美跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野乃美跟随前往。

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.jp: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.thai: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.ko: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.
desc.zh_tw: 從星野和綾音口中，老師獲知了阿拜多斯欠下9億6235萬元債務的事情，並且得知阿拜多斯地區近年經常發生沙塵暴，學校雖投入大量資金卻仍無法逆轉；由於沒有銀行願意為他們貸款，他們不得不轉向高利貸公司，但沙漠化越來越嚴重，債務水漲船高，償還無望，導致很多學生離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.jp: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.thai: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.ko: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.zh_tw: 老師讀了阿拜多斯高中寄來的信後，得知學生們受到暴力組織欺壓的消息，於是便前往阿拜多斯自治區幫助他們，但卻 一下子就迷路遇難了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。

desc.en: After taking office for several days, Arona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.jp: After taking office for several days, Arona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.thai: After taking office for several days, Arona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.ko: After taking office for several days, Arona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 在上任幾天後，阿羅娜表示許多學生都送來了求助信，而其中一篇則來自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.thai: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.ko: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.jp: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.thai: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.ko: Sensei read the letter from Abydos, knowing that they were under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.zh_tw: 老師閱讀了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力組織攻擊、彈藥耗盡等問題，並由此請求老師的幫助。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师阅读了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师阅读了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师阅读了阿拜多斯的信，信中提到了阿拜多斯遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。

desc.en: Arona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.jp: Arona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.thai: Arona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.ko: Arona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.zh_tw: 阿羅娜向老師簡單介紹了一下阿拜多斯當地的情況，並對“阿拜多斯學院”被攻擊一事感到驚異。之後，老師立刻到阿拜多斯自治區出差。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.thai: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.ko: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.jp: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.thai: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.ko: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.zh_tw: 老師收到一封怪信，於是便前往千年學園的遊戲開發部，在該處見到開發遊戲中的雙胞胎學生，綠和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。

desc.en: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.jp: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.thai: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.ko: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei heard about a strange story about a hero.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在意識模糊之際，聽到了一段奇怪的關於勇者的故事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。

desc.en: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.jp: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.thai: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.ko: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Club. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.zh_tw: 老師最終醒了過來，發現自己到了遊戲開發部，並得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷過去。桃井和綠提到了他們的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.thai: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.ko: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Aorona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.zh_tw: 老師收到了遊戲開發部的信件，並從中得知了遊戲開發部將要被廢社的消息；彩奈順便介紹了一些千年學院的概況。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.thai: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - yet, everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠向老師做了自我介紹，並提議一起前往廢墟；同時提及廢社是優香要求的——然而，此時眾人卻被一陣聲音打斷。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
